title: (x) Barclays Bank corporate sans - custom typeface by Monotype {Yves}
content:
Hello everyone. I just wanted to identify the typeface used in the Barclays Bank corporate identity, for body copy. I´m talking about the sans serif typeface. Is it a custom or does it have a vendable family?

Thanks ;)
author: seml

comments.content: Lazy, wasn´t I? Thank you very much. I wanted to see who developped the work, particularly the "Expert Sans" series, which I find very well conceived.
